channel.title: Talk about a borked system
channel.description:
This entire Moparcraft idea needs reworking, I may sound like a broken record when I say this because I'm sick of saying it myself. Everything that is done on Moparcraft is inefficient and relies mainly on Moparisthebest, instead of adding to the list of tasks he has to do we should instead look to create an efficient system which is self running without intervention.
An inefficient system is a bad system, in short. The most annoying thing is that it's not a case of "I can't think of anyways to improve the current system" it's more a case of nothing getting changed to make it an efficient system.
So I'm going to spend some time going over the main issues which restrict server activity.
[hr]
[b]Server Updating - [/b] This one is a killer, we take months to update and we rely on plugins which don't even work most the time or contain unreasonable amounts of buggy features.
We should look for plugins which work the most effectively and review them before their use, none of us can be blamed because the author doesn't update but let us remember that MITB has a lot of sponsored server money a programmer over at MITB forums would gladly update the plugin for a small fee per time.
If you're willing to pay for other things to help other mopar communities, why wouldn't you be willing to help MC?
[hr]
[b]Lack of staff agreement - [/b] "members of the community look up to staff members" - quote from the __________ board. With a staff team which doesn't agree on much we're not exactly sending down the vibes of a popular well managed server, in short the rules need a rework to something that is universally agreed upon.
What is said in the staff section, stays in the staff section. Drawing blood on a staff related argument outside the section itself should be stopped. I'll be the first to admit I've probably done this before.
[hr]
[b]The lagg - [/b] I'm not going to blame this on one single factor, but we need to start taking this issue more seriously because something is causing it. If it's the 1.8.1 MC then we need to update ASAP (See previous point on Moparcraft developer).
[hr]
[b]Completing old tasks- [/b] Uhm, we still need a W2 world map and the SSP I think they're both vital features :rolleyes:
[hr] I don't want an empty thread this time, instead I want discussion. I'm going to step up the pressure on agreed things until they get added. I spend huge amounts of my time trying to do positive things which will better the community but nothing ever seems to get done or even discussed most of the time.
This isn't going to go away, and neither am I so I'll continue making these threads and reiterating myself until we have a real discussion where issues are resolved.
UPDATE - I'd also like to bring up the Tarkoff promotion nomination, is this going ahead, if so when?

item.title: Talk about a borked system
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve brought up the VPS argument before, apparently the current server it is hosted on is very good therefore spending money would be a waste. I’ve also said before that there should be a control panel in which a certain group of people can do things themselves, he agreed with this, five months ago

As for the staff disagreements, I agree they can be beneficial but drawing them out for everyone to see in a fighting fashion isn’t my idea of a respectable debate. My point was if a real disagreement occurs they should be handled in private rather than dragging their reputation through the dirt. Basically this:

Davidi2:

Just need to make sure the playerbase doesn’t see any argument or important discussion

As for rewriting the server, I don’t think anyone would be willing to do that…
